con:testCase.name: BM User_RFDD Unprioritized_allowed to be Stopped
con:testCase.con:description: BM User creates Several Payments with Payment status-RFDD. Verify Payment status In Transactions. Process the Payment Stop Request and verify the response. Verify Priortize status in Transction before Unpriortize. Process the Payment UnPriortized Request and verify the response, it should throw an error Message "Illegal status to update" with Payment status as "STOPPED" Verify Priortize status in Transction After Unpriortize.

con:config.con:query: select CUSTOMERID,ACCOUNTNUMBER from V_authorisation where CUSTBANKID='4201' and length(customerID)='11' and ROWNUM = 1

con:config.con:query: select unique(A.MESSAGEID),A.MARKETTYPE,A.MESSAGEIDENTIFICATION,C.ENDTOENDID,C.DEBITCOUNTERVALUEAMT, A.NUMBEROFTRANSACTIONS,C.TRANSACTIONSID,C.FK_PAYMENTINFOID,C.PAYMENTTYPE,C.PAYMENTSTATUS,C.MARKETPRODUCTNAME,C.ISPC, C.FK_PROCESSINGLINEID,C.DEBETACCOUNTNO from MESSAGE A,PAYMENTINFO B, TRANSACTIONS C, ADVICETRANSACTION D where A.MESSAGEID = B.FK_MESSAGEID and B.PAYMENTINFOID = C.FK_PAYMENTINFOID and C.ENDTOENDID = '${Properties#EndtoEndID}'

con:request.name: PaymentStop
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentstatusupdate:v2_0" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:payment-status-update:v2_0"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>${Properties#DestinationApplication}</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <!--Optional:--> <wsc:orgunit>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgunit> <!--Optional:--> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <!--Optional:--> <wsc:locale>en</wsc:locale> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.2</wsc:ip> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <wsc:item key="${Properties#Key1}" value="${Properties#Value1}"/> <wsc:item key="${Properties#Key2}" value="${Properties#Value2}"/> <wsc:item key="${Properties#Key3}" value="${Properties#Value3}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentStopRequest> <urn:transactionInput> <urn1:transactionId>${Verify-Paymentstatus-DB#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/TRANSACTIONSID[1]}</urn1:transactionId> <urn1:transactionId>${Verify-Paymentstatus-DB#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[2]/TRANSACTIONSID[1]}</urn1:transactionId> <urn1:transactionId>${Verify-Paymentstatus-DB#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[3]/TRANSACTIONSID[1]}</urn1:transactionId> <urn1:transactionId>${Verify-Paymentstatus-DB#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[4]/TRANSACTIONSID[1]}</urn1:transactionId> </urn:transactionInput> </urn:PaymentStopRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: PaymentUnprioritize
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentstatusupdate:v2_0" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:payment-status-update:v2_0"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>${Properties#DestinationApplication}</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:orgunit>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgunit> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="${Properties#Key1}" value="${Properties#Value1}"/> <wsc:item key="${Properties#Key2}" value="${Properties#Value2}"/> <wsc:item key="${Properties#Key3}" value="${Properties#Value3}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentUnprioritizeRequest> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 4 items at this level--> <urn:transactionInput> <urn1:transactionId>${Verify-Paymentstatus-DB#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/TRANSACTIONSID[1]}</urn1:transactionId> <urn1:transactionId>${Verify-Paymentstatus-DB#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[2]/TRANSACTIONSID[1]}</urn1:transactionId> <urn1:transactionId>${Verify-Paymentstatus-DB#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[3]/TRANSACTIONSID[1]}</urn1:transactionId> <urn1:transactionId>${Verify-Paymentstatus-DB#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[4]/TRANSACTIONSID[1]}</urn1:transactionId> </urn:transactionInput> </urn:PaymentUnprioritizeRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:elements.con:expectedValue: Status update failed for all matching payments. Ref. ResultCode of each StatusUpdateResults for details

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <ns3:PaymentUnprioritizeResponse xmlns:ns8="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:nationalinformation-nor:v2_0" xmlns:ns7="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentutil:v2_0" xmlns:ns6="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0" xmlns:ns5="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentutil:v2_0" xmlns:ns4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:common:v2_0" xmlns:ns3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentstatusupdate:v2_0" xmlns:ns2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:payment-status-update:v2_0" xmlns="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22"> <ns4:ResponseState> <ErrorCode>6600</ErrorCode> <Severity>2</Severity> <ComponentId>111</ComponentId> <Message>Status update failed for all matching payments. Ref. ResultCode of each StatusUpdateResults for details</Message> <LogSequence xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> </ns4:ResponseState> <ns3:paymentStatusUpdateSummary> <ns2:paymentStatus>STOPPED</ns2:paymentStatus> <ns2:errorCode>6594</ns2:errorCode> <ns2:severity>3</ns2:severity> <ns2:message>Illegal status to update</ns2:message> <ns2:numberOfTransactions>4</ns2:numberOfTransactions> </ns3:paymentStatusUpdateSummary> <ns3:paymentStatusUpdateResult> <ns2:messageId>471149</ns2:messageId> <ns2:paymentInfoId>519315</ns2:paymentInfoId> <ns2:transactionId>260262291</ns2:transactionId> <ns2:paymentStatus>STOPPED</ns2:paymentStatus> <ns2:errorCode>6594</ns2:errorCode> <ns2:severity>3</ns2:severity> <ns2:message>Illegal status to update</ns2:message> </ns3:paymentStatusUpdateResult> <ns3:paymentStatusUpdateResult> <ns2:messageId>471149</ns2:messageId> <ns2:paymentInfoId>519315</ns2:paymentInfoId> <ns2:transactionId>260262290</ns2:transactionId> <ns2:paymentStatus>STOPPED</ns2:paymentStatus> <ns2:errorCode>6594</ns2:errorCode> <ns2:severity>3</ns2:severity> <ns2:message>Illegal status to update</ns2:message> </ns3:paymentStatusUpdateResult> <ns3:paymentStatusUpdateResult> <ns2:messageId>471149</ns2:messageId> <ns2:paymentInfoId>519315</ns2:paymentInfoId> <ns2:transactionId>260262289</ns2:transactionId> <ns2:paymentStatus>STOPPED</ns2:paymentStatus> <ns2:errorCode>6594</ns2:errorCode> <ns2:severity>3</ns2:severity> <ns2:message>Illegal status to update</ns2:message> </ns3:paymentStatusUpdateResult> <ns3:paymentStatusUpdateResult> <ns2:messageId>471149</ns2:messageId> <ns2:paymentInfoId>519315</ns2:paymentInfoId> <ns2:transactionId>260262288</ns2:transactionId> <ns2:paymentStatus>STOPPED</ns2:paymentStatus> <ns2:errorCode>6594</ns2:errorCode> <ns2:severity>3</ns2:severity> <ns2:message>Illegal status to update</ns2:message> </ns3:paymentStatusUpdateResult> </ns3:PaymentUnprioritizeResponse> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>
